values.name: phoneValue
values.description: Phone number. No structure is enforced.

values.name: multiSelectValue
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

values.name: selectValue
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: statusValue
values.description: Name of the option you want to set. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: urlValue
values.description: Web address

values.name: peopleValue
values.description: List of users. Multiples can be defined separated by comma. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

values.name: relationValue
values.description: List of databases that belong to another database. Multiples can be defined separated by comma.

values.name: checkboxValue
values.description: Whether or not the checkbox is checked. true represents checked. false represents unchecked.

values.name: numberValue
values.description: Number value

values.name: range
values.description: Whether or not you want to define a date range

values.name: includeTime
values.description: Whether or not to include the time in the date

values.description: An ISO 8601 format date, with optional time

values.name: dateStart
values.description: An ISO 8601 format date, with optional time

values.name: dateEnd
values.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date, with optional time. Represents the end of a date range.

values.name: timezone
values.description: Time zone to use. By default n8n timezone is used. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: url
values.description: Link to externally hosted file

jsonNotice.displayName: See Notion guide to creating filters
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'block' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'blockId'
IF @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 2.2}} THEN HIDE parameter 'blockId'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'append' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 2.2}} THEN SHOW parameter 'blockId'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'append' THEN SHOW parameter 'blockUi'
IF type == 'paragraph' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'paragraph' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'paragraph' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF textType == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF textType == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'isLink'
IF textType == 'text' AND isLink == True THEN SHOW parameter 'textLink'
IF textType == 'mention' THEN SHOW parameter 'mentionType'
IF mentionType == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'user'
IF mentionType == 'page' THEN SHOW parameter 'page'
IF mentionType == 'database' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF mentionType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF mentionType == 'date' AND range == False THEN SHOW parameter 'date'
IF mentionType == 'date' AND range == True THEN SHOW parameter 'dateStart'
IF range == True AND mentionType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'dateEnd'
IF textType == 'equation' THEN SHOW parameter 'expression'
IF type == 'heading_1' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'heading_1' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'heading_1' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'heading_2' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'heading_2' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'heading_2' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'heading_3' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'heading_3' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'heading_3' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'toggle' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'toggle' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'toggle' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'to_do' THEN SHOW parameter 'checked'
IF type == 'to_do' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'to_do' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'to_do' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'child_page' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF type == 'bulleted_list_item' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'bulleted_list_item' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'bulleted_list_item' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'numbered_list_item' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'numbered_list_item' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'numbered_list_item' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'blockId'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'getAll' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'gte': 2.2}} THEN SHOW parameter 'blockId'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'fetchNestedBlocks'
IF resource == 'block' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplifyOutput'
IF @version IN [1, 2] THEN HIDE parameter 'simplifyOutput'
IF resource == 'database' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'operation'
IF @version == 1 AND resource == 'database' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'databaseId'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation IN ["getAll", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'search' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'database' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'databasePage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF @version == 1 AND resource == 'databasePage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'databaseId'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'propertiesUi'
IF type == 'title' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF type == 'rich_text' THEN SHOW parameter 'richText'
IF type == 'rich_text' AND richText == False THEN SHOW parameter 'textContent'
IF type == 'rich_text' AND richText == True THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'phone_number' THEN SHOW parameter 'phoneValue'
IF type == 'multi_select' THEN SHOW parameter 'multiSelectValue'
IF type == 'select' THEN SHOW parameter 'selectValue'
IF type == 'status' THEN SHOW parameter 'statusValue'
IF type == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'emailValue'
IF type == 'url' THEN SHOW parameter 'ignoreIfEmpty'
IF type == 'url' THEN SHOW parameter 'urlValue'
IF type == 'people' THEN SHOW parameter 'peopleValue'
IF type == 'relation' THEN SHOW parameter 'relationValue'
IF type == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'checkboxValue'
IF type == 'number' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberValue'
IF type == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'range'
IF type == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'includeTime'
IF range == False AND type == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'date'
IF range == True AND type == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'dateStart'
IF range == True AND type == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'dateEnd'
IF type == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'timezone'
IF type == 'files' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileUrls'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'fileUrls'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'blockUi'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'pageId'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'propertiesUi'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'pageId'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'pageId'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'databaseId'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filterType'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'filterType'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'getAll' AND filterType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'matchType'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'matchType'
IF resource == 'databasePage' AND operation == 'getAll' AND filterType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF @version == 1 THEN HIDE parameter 'filters'
